definition: (once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
second only to.../(in second place) preceded only by...
one and only (idiom); rarely seen/unique of its kind
only remaining of the great (idiom); one of the few greats extant
that's all/just this and nothing more

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面仅就已观察到的几种伞形科植物的反应予以说明。

sentences.english: All patients recovered after operation except 1 case died of diabetes insipidus.
sentences.chinese: 绝大多数患者手术后恢复良好，仅1例死于尿崩症。

sentences.english: Above term only apply to dorsa above3,000 bales.
sentences.chinese: 以上条件，仅适用于三千捆以上的订单。

sentences.english: It took only a short walk on a Beijing street to find other foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 我在北京街头仅走了一小段路来寻找其他的外国人。

sentences.english: Onchocerciasis is limited to six Latin American countries.
sentences.chinese: 盘尾丝虫病仅在6个拉丁美洲国家存在。

sentences.english: Is Bonasera the only one left?
sentences.chinese: 勃纳瑟拉是仅有的一个被留下来的？

sentences.english: Libertarian says you can't know just from the facts I've just given you.
sentences.chinese: 他们说，你不能仅从这个事实来判断。

sentences.english: Among grains, only rice is consumed in great quantities than wheat. (Todd Korol/Reuters)
sentences.chinese: 在所有谷物里，仅有大米的消耗量比小麦多。

sentences.english: In this example we maintain only one copy of the data.
sentences.chinese: 在这个例子中，我们仅维护数据的一个副本。

sentences.english: Only one personality stands out in my memory.
sentences.chinese: 仅有一个人物耸立在我的记忆里。

sentences.english: Women, for instance, make up only 13% of contributors.
sentences.chinese: 再比方说女性在参与者中，仅占了13%的比例。

sentences.english: Prescription drugs represent only about one-tenth of all health care spending in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 处方药仅占美国医疗保健费用的十分之一。

sentences.english: Signs include exercise intolerance, but often there is only a heart murmur.
sentences.chinese: 临床症状包括运动不耐，但大多数病例仅有心脏杂音。

sentences.english: One day is hardly enough to show our gratitude。
sentences.chinese: 仅这一天远不足以表达我们对您的感激之情。

sentences.english: Racial feats are available only to characters of a specific race.
sentences.chinese: 种族专长仅适用于人物的特定种族。

sentences.english: I want to go there, can you take with me?
sentences.chinese: 仅这个梦想，我花尽了心思。

definition: grain that has begun to ripen/variant of 衹|只[zhi3]
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
that level or higher/that amount or more/the above-mentioned/(used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
